item.title: Show HN：播放列表 - 在20秒内为任何心情生成播放列表
item.description:
Hey HN,I built PlaylistGen because I was tired of spending more time finding music than actually working or enjoying it.Scrolling through endless Spotify playlists, skipping half the songs, killing my flow… it was a productivity black hole.PlaylistGen is a simple web app that creates a 15-song playlist for any mood or work context in ~20 seconds.You choose your vibe — focus, creative,管理员或休闲 - 选择类型或给它3首您喜欢的歌曲。该应用程序然后构建一个没有重复的播放列表，对您的氛围进行了优化，并为Spotify和YouTube提供直接链接。尝试一下 https://www.playlistgen.co 。会喜欢HN人群的反馈！
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44865083 点：1 ＃评论：0
